verses.verse: David <S%H1732><s%> was told, <S%H5046><s%> "Behold, <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines are fighting <S%H3898><s%> against Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> and are robbing <S%H8154><s%> the threshing floors. <S%H1637><s%>"

Therefore David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Shall I go <S%H3212><s%> and strike <S%H5221><s%> these Philistines? <S%H6430><s%>" Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> "Go <S%H3212><s%> strike <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> Keilah. <S%H7084><s%>"

David <S%H1732><s%>'s men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3373><s%> "Behold, we are afraid here in Judah: <S%H3063><s%> how much more then if we go <S%H3212><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%> against the armies <S%H4634><s%> of the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%>"

Then David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> yet again. <S%H3254><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him, <S%H6030><s%> and said, "Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go down <S%H3381><s%> to Keilah; <S%H7084><s%> for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and brought away <S%H5090><s%> their livestock, <S%H4735><s%> and killed <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter. <S%H4347><s%> So David <S%H1732><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Keilah. <S%H7084><s%>

It happened, <S%H54><s%> when Abiathar the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> that he came down <S%H3381><s%> with an ephod <S%H646><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

It was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had come <S%H935><s%> to Keilah. <S%H7084><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> has delivered <S%H5234><s%> him into my hand; <S%H3027><s%> for he is shut in, <S%H5462><s%> by entering <S%H935><s%> into a town <S%H5892><s%> that has gates <S%H1817><s%> and bars. <S%H1280><s%>"

Saul <S%H7586><s%> summoned <S%H8085><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%> to <S%H8085><s%> war, <S%H4421><s%> to go down <S%H3381><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> to besiege <S%H6696><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men. <S%H582><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> was devising <S%H2790><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%> against him; <S%H559><s%> and he said to Abiathar <S%H54><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> "Bring the ephod <S%H646><s%> here. <S%H5066><s%>"

Then David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "O Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> has surely <S%H8085><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> seeks <S%H1245><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the city for my sake. <S%H5892><s%>

Will the men <S%H1167><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> deliver me up <S%H5462><s%> into his hand? <S%H3027><s%> Will Saul <S%H7586><s%> come down, <S%H3381><s%> as your servant <S%H5650><s%> has heard? <S%H8085><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I beg you, <S%H5046><s%> tell your servant. <S%H5650><s%>" Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "He will come down. <S%H3381><s%>"

Then David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Will the men <S%H1167><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> deliver <S%H5462><s%> me and my men <S%H582><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul? <S%H7586><s%>" Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "They will deliver you up. <S%H5462><s%>"

Then David <S%H1732><s%> and his men, <S%H582><s%> who were about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and departed <S%H3318><s%> out of Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> wherever <S%H834><s%> they could go. <S%H1980><s%> It was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> was escaped <S%H4422><s%> from Keilah; <S%H7084><s%> and he gave <S%H2308><s%> up going there. <S%H3318><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in the strongholds, <S%H4679><s%> and remained <S%H3427><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Ziph. <S%H2128><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> him every day, <S%H3117><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> didn't <S%H5414><s%> deliver him into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> had come out <S%H3318><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> his life. <S%H5315><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> was in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Ziph <S%H2128><s%> in the wood. <S%H2793><s%>

Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> into the woods, <S%H2793><s%> and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> in God. <S%H430><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3372><s%> "Don't be afraid; for the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> shall not find <S%H4672><s%> you; <S%H4427><s%> and you shall be king over Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and I shall be next <S%H4932><s%> to you; <S%H7586><s%> and that also Saul my father <S%H1><s%> knows. <S%H3045><s%>"

They both <S%H8147><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the woods, <S%H2793><s%> and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to his house. <S%H1004><s%>

Then the Ziphites <S%H2130><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> to Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Doesn't <S%H1732><s%> David hide <S%H5641><s%> himself with us in the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> in the wood, <S%H2793><s%> in the hill <S%H1389><s%> of Hachilah, <S%H2444><s%> which is on the south <S%H3225><s%> of the desert? <S%H3452><s%>

Now therefore, <S%H4428><s%> O king, come down, <S%H3381><s%> according to all the desire <S%H185><s%> of your soul <S%H5315><s%> to come down; <S%H3381><s%> and our part shall be to deliver <S%H5462><s%> him up into the king <S%H4428><s%>'s hand. <S%H3027><s%>"
Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "You are blessed <S%H1288><s%> by Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for you have had compassion on me. <S%H2550><s%>

Please go <S%H3212><s%> make <S%H3559><s%> yet more sure, <S%H3045><s%> and know and see <S%H7200><s%> his place <S%H4725><s%> where his haunt <S%H7272><s%> is, <S%H7200><s%> and who has seen him there; <S%H559><s%> for it is told me that he deals very <S%H6191><s%> subtly. <S%H6191><s%>

See <S%H7200><s%> therefore, <S%H3045><s%> and take knowledge of all the lurking places <S%H4224><s%> where he hides <S%H2244><s%> himself, <S%H7725><s%> and come again to me with certainty, <S%H3559><s%> and I will go <S%H1980><s%> with you: <S%H3426><s%> and it shall happen, if he is in the land, <S%H776><s%> that I will search <S%H2664><s%> him out among all the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>"

They arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to Ziph <S%H2128><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Saul: <S%H7586><s%> but David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> were in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon, <S%H4584><s%> in the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> on the south <S%H3225><s%> of the desert. <S%H3452><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> him. <S%H1732><s%> When David was told, <S%H5046><s%> he went down <S%H3381><s%> to the rock, <S%H5553><s%> and stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon. <S%H4584><s%> When Saul <S%H7586><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that, <S%H7291><s%> he pursued <S%H310><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon. <S%H4584><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> on this side <S%H6654><s%> of the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> on that side <S%H6654><s%> of the mountain: <S%H2022><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> made haste <S%H2648><s%> to get away <S%H3212><s%> for fear <S%H6440><s%> of Saul; <S%H7586><s%> for Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> surrounded <S%H5849><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> to <S%H5849><s%> take them. <S%H8610><s%>

But a messenger <S%H4397><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Hurry <S%H4116><s%> and come; <S%H3212><s%> for the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have made a raid <S%H6584><s%> on the land! <S%H776><s%>"

So Saul <S%H7586><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from pursuing <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> therefore they called <S%H7121><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> Sela Hammahlekoth. <S%H5555><s%>
David <S%H1732><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from there, <S%H3427><s%> and lived in the strongholds <S%H4679><s%> of En Gedi. <S%H5872><s%>
